item.title: Gohugo Site Generator
item.description: What is Hugo? The claim is that Hugo is: The worldâ€™s fastest framework for building websites SImply put, it’s an open-source static site generator. Start local Hugo server hugo server New Post hugo new posts/----.md Tags tags: ["hugo"] Themes https://minimo.netlify.com/docs/ Images Resources http://danbahrami.io/articles/building-a-production-website-with-hugo-and-gulp-js/ Hugo Basic Usage

item.title: Going Static on Git
item.description: Well, sometimes I’m stubborn. Web 3.0 - imo - is seeing more sites back to static. Why? Because it’s fun! No WordPress, no db, no cms - just plain old HTML, text editor, Markdown - you get it. Simpler, faster, better? Better a in sense of not thrashing the server, setting up dbs, getting knocked on, etc. Hugo This page/site built with Hugo. Connecting Hugo with Forestry … Tried Forestry - very promosing, but does not (yet) support v.
